amendment.description: Amendment sought to use the Holman Rule to reduce the salary of Mark Gabriel, the Administrator of the Western Area Power Administration, to $1.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 29 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to use the Holman Rule to reduce the salary of Mark Gabriel, the Administrator of the Western Area Power Administration, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 139 - 276, 2 Present (Roll no. 249).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Gosar.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
